occurrences.text: and great, rich and poor, free and bond, to receive a mark in their right hand or in their foreheads. And that no man, notice what it says, might buy or sell, save he that had the mark, or the name of the beast, or the number of his name. So we're just going to say, you can't buy or sell, unless you have this. You know, people are going to get it. Because they're going to be desperate. There may be some people that say, yeah, I'm not going to do that. They get hungry enough. I think there are going to be people that line up and say, do you want to put it here or here? You can do both if you want. Honestly. People are going to do crazy stuff. Why are we saying that? Well, we see what happens in Egypt during this great famine. We see what happens in Israel in 2 Kings 6. We understand what's going to happen in Revelation 13. And as we begin to think about our lives and think about where we are, there are going to be some things that we face. We've got to keep our eyes on the Lord. Keep our eyes on the Lord. People do crazy stuff during times of desperation. It's interesting to me as you read chapter 47, the distinction in Genesis 47 between what's happening with the children of Israel and what's happening with the Egyptians.
